feedback.Physical object: Included — Lava has tangible, spatially continuous material form.
feedback.Man-made / synthetic: Excluded — It is a naturally occurring geological event.
feedback.Biological or biologically-inspired: Excluded — Not derived from or imitative of biological systems.
feedback.Fixed/static: Excluded — It is dynamic and fluid by nature.
feedback.Structural: Excluded — It is not a load-bearing or support structure.
feedback.Perceptible: Included — Observable by sight, touch, and thermal sensors.
feedback.Material form: Included — Composed of molten rock, physically and chemically defined.
feedback.Passive: Excluded — It is an active, transformative physical process.
feedback.Purposeful / intentional: Excluded — Has no goal or design.
feedback.Emits output / produces effect: Included — Alters terrain, generates heat, and causes environmental changes.
feedback.Transforms or modifies internal state: Included — Cools and solidifies, transitioning material phase.
feedback.Interacts with humans directly: Excluded — It affects humans, but not interactively or responsively.
feedback.Part of a larger system: Included — A component of volcanic/geological cycles.
feedback.Autonomous in function: Included — Operates according to physical principles without intervention.
feedback.System-critical: Excluded — While significant, it is not essential to Earth’s system functions.
feedback.Symbolic / representational: Excluded — May be metaphorically used, but not inherently symbolic.
feedback.Communicative: Excluded — Does not convey or encode information.
feedback.Logical / rule-based: Included — Governed by deterministic physical laws.
feedback.Hierarchical / modular: Excluded — Not composed of parts in a modular structure.
feedback.Behavior-guiding: Excluded — Does not instruct or guide action.
feedback.Self-referential / meta-conceptual: Excluded — Not capable of modeling itself.
feedback.Temporal: Included — Occurs over time and has distinct beginning and end phases.
feedback.Contextual abstraction: Excluded — Has consistent identity regardless of context.
feedback.Socially / culturally constructed: Excluded — Exists independently of human culture.
feedback.Defined by a group/system: Excluded — Not defined by institutional or cultural systems.
feedback.Linked to identity or role: Excluded — Not associated with roles or identity.
feedback.Teachable / transmissible: Included — Commonly taught in earth sciences.
feedback.Visible: Included — Highly visible and often dramatic in appearance.
feedback.Context-sensitive: Excluded — Meaning and function remain consistent across contexts.
